  • public class Player
extends Combatant
    A representation of your player on the game board.
    Author:
    OrbisAccess

    • Method Detail

      • didMakeMoveLastTurn

        public boolean didMakeMoveLastTurn()
        Check whether you have made a move last turn on the game board.
        Returns:
        true if last move wasn't Move.NONE
        See Also:
        Move

      • wasHit

        public boolean wasHit()
        See if you were hit last turn.
        Returns:
        true if hit

      • shotByProjectileTypes

        public java.util.ArrayList<ProjectileTypes> shotByProjectileTypes()
        Returns a list of the projectiles that hit you.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList indexed along with getShooters() of all the projectiles that hit you
        See Also:
        ProjectileTypes

      • getShooters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Combatant> getShooters()
        Returns a list of the players that hit you.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList indexed along with shotByProjectileTypes() of all the players that hit you. NOTE: null if turret was the one who shot you.
        See Also:
        Combatant
